subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The jockey John Velazquez was dumped in the seventh race at Aqueduct in Queens, fracturing a rib and chipping a bone in his right wrist, when his mount, Katie Malone, stumbled.
snippet: The jockey John Velazquez was dumped in the seventh race at Aqueduct in Queens, fracturing a rib and chipping a bone in his right wrist, when his mount, Katie Malone, stumbled.
